Reviews.Title: bb storm
Reviews.Author: Renny
Reviews.Content: I have had this blackberry sorm now for over 3 months and I must say thus far it has not given me any problems. I upgraded from the bb curve my only issue is that i sometimes miss my keypad but its all good.

Reviews.Title: very satisfied
Reviews.Author: alvaro villalobos
Reviews.Content: i was very satisfied with the status of the phone, it came as new, in a box full of accessories which i was not expecting, the phone itself seemed flawless no scratches or physical damage, the only bad part was that it wasn't unlocked but that wasn't a big deal, i must say I'm very satisfied. thank you.

Reviews.Title: i hate it,can't believe them!
Reviews.Author: carlton
Reviews.Content: the phone was a dud,they knew they were selling used junk and they still did,even the charger was broken,so hope who got the $ and know what they sold and did have a blest life and get rich.

Reviews.Title: luis chavez
Reviews.Author: Luis Chavez
Reviews.Content: Fue Excelente, la compra y llego en el tiempo estimado de la entrega recomiendo el producto muy bueno 100% recomendado

Reviews.Title: Un robo
Reviews.Author: Daniela
Reviews.Content: Celular reconstruido no me duro ni un mes, luego quería que se los reenviara y yo debia cancelar los envios  no los recomiendo no caigan como yo

Reviews.Title: good phone
Reviews.Author: T. Nguyen "dynerebon05"
Reviews.Content: love the quality of this phone. i like how you can feel the button pressing motion as you press on the phone. its very unique.

Reviews.Title: blackberry 950
Reviews.Author: luis
Reviews.Content: I didn't know there was a bb 950, isn't this a typo?Maybe you meant 9500 or 9550?Please let me know.
